comments.body: can you add from the OP: ``fy.rollback(pd.Timestamp('2003-12-31'))`` (which I think is the same result) as well

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +614,618 @@    assert fy.rollback(dt) == Timestamp('2002-12-28')
    assert (-fy).apply(dt) == Timestamp('2002-12-28')
    assert dt - fy == Timestamp('2002-12-28')

    assert fy.rollforward(dt) == Timestamp('2004-01-03')
